forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
